org.zaproxy.zap.network

Class ZapHttpParser

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.zaproxy.zap.network.ZapHttpParser

  • public class ZapHttpParser
extends Object
    A utility class to parse HTTP response headers.

    Used to override the HttpClient behaviour to accept HTTP responses which contain malformed HTTP header lines.

    Note: Malformed HTTP header lines are ignored (instead of throwing an exception).
